title: Socket-Outlets, Switches, and Other Accessories
fullText: Socket-outlets, switches, and other accessories shall be designed such that provision is made to prevent the retention of moisture within their enclosure. This requirement may be satisfied by the use of socket-outlets, switches, and other accessories, and control gear having the required degree of protection, in accordance with Clause 6.6.3.1, or Clause 6.7, as appropriate, that are permanently sealed.
